message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $13,500. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm interested in the product, but $13,500 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $9,500 is significantly below its true worth. I'm willing to come down to $12,000.  This is a very competitive price for a product of this caliber.
I understand the product's value, but $12,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it.
